programme.title: The Motherhood
programme.desc: Single mom Kathleen is ready to let go of the past and rediscover herself as her son Zane enters his pre-teen years. With a little help The Motherhood, she unpacks more than just boxes and finds support through community.

programme.title: Blind Date Book Club
programme.desc: A bookstore owner finds love and direction in her life when she agrees to review a famous author's new novel.

programme.desc: The women try to help a neighborhood couple, George and Renee Corliss, patch up their faltering marriage.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche announces that she is canceling a date with her latest boyfriend, because he does not meet her standards.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy dismays when her daughter is too forgiving of her unfaithful husband.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: When two police officers set up surveillance equipment in Blanche's house, Dorothy, Rose, Blanche and Sophia are more interested in snaring the policemen.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Through a series of flashbacks, the housemates reminisce about their birthday celebrations.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Barbra Jean convinces unenthusiastic Reba to go clubbing; Van explains the birds and the bees to Jake.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: As he tries to woo a powerful sports agent who also happens to be gay, Van accidentally "outs" his mother-in-law.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba and Cheyenne throw a surprise party in honor of Van's new arena football contract, but the real surprise comes when Van announces he has been traded to a team in Denver.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba confronts Brock and Barbra Jean's therapist when she learns he holds her responsible for most of their marital problems; Cheyenne prepares to console Van on his first visit home but is crushed to find that he loves his life in Denver.

programme.desc: Frasier begins to suspect his attractive new attorney (Teri Polo) is unfairly running up his bill. Also guest starring Saul Rubinek.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier tries to keep Roz from discovering he is chummy with her ex-boyfriend (Gary Cole).

programme.desc: Norm is the "love target" of his obsessive former secretary.

programme.desc: Sam enlists Carla and Norm to help him race Robin's yacht in the Boston Regatta.

programme.desc: Reba and Barbra Jean battle over who should host Thanksgiving dinner and feelings get hurt; BJ cooks.

programme.desc: Reba allows Kyra to spend time unsupervised with her boyfriend, but she questions that decision when she learns they broke the rules.

programme.desc: The housemates recall some of their absurd moneymaking schemes.

programme.desc: Courtesy of their new housekeeper's magic potions, Blanche's social life perks up and Dorothy wins the battle against insomnia.

programme.desc: A country star on the rise has a short time to plan her wedding when a date opens up at Graceland Chapel.

programme.title: Over the Moon in Love
programme.desc: With her matchmaking business on the verge of closing, a woman finds herself in the unique position of being featured in a magazine, but she must set up the writer with her childhood friend.

programme.title: Under the Autumn Moon
programme.desc: While scouting a dude ranch for the outdoor adventure company that employs her, a woman rediscovers her passion for the great outdoors and becomes smitten with the ranch's owner.

programme.title: Autumn at Apple Hill
programme.desc: A woman inherits an inn from her grandparents.

programme.title: Sweet Pecan Summer
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a young woman and her ex-boyfriend as they work together to sell her aunt's pecan farm.

programme.title: A Harvest Wedding
programme.desc: Sarah Bloom, a highly successful wedding planner, returns to her hometown to plan the season's biggest wedding. Much to Sarah's surprise, the bride's brother happens to be her first love.

programme.desc: The women confront their phobias on a flight to the Bahamas to attend a funeral.

programme.desc: Frasier experiences a midlife crisis when broadcasters announce he will receive a lifetime-achievement award.

programme.desc: Frasier and Niles try to boost their masculinity by taking an automobile repair class.

programme.desc: Cliff's storehouse of irrelevant facts is tested when he becomes a contestant on "Jeopardy!".

programme.desc: Woody (Woody Harrelson) is more than a little concerned when his girlfriend's mother (Melendy Britt) makes passes at him.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Cheyenne and the rest of the family try to cheer Van up after a knee injury ends his arena-football career.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba learns that Van has hired a nanny so that he can spend more time goofing off and doing all the things he didn't do before.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Barbra Jean confesses that she has a big crush on her new marriage counselor, and she asks Reba to help her fire him.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba decides to pursue a career in real estate, and Brock reluctantly allows her to handle the sale of his condo.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose, concerned about the nuclear arms race, mails letters to President Reagan and Soviet leader Mikhail Gorbachev.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: A political candidate announces that he had an affair with Blanche, a contention that she denies.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy makes her ex-husband, Stanley Zbornak, jealous when she has an affair with his brother Theodore.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose's cousin, Sven Lindstrom, arrives from Sweden and falls in love with Blanche.

programme.title: Winter Love Story
programme.desc: When author Cassie's first novel isn't selling, she is paired on a book tour with author Elliot to boost her sales, but along the way, a romance starts to blossom.

programme.title: Love at First Bark
programme.desc: A single woman with a new, out of control German shepherd turns to a handsome dog trainer for help. As they make progress with the dog, she realizes she may be developing feelings for the trainer.

programme.title: Romance With a Twist
programme.desc: Former dancer Luna pairs up with Bennett, a world-class aerialist, when he finds himself without a partner for his upcoming performance at the local arts festival.

programme.title: Feeling Butterflies
programme.desc: Emily's booming butterfly business delivers monarchs to a birthday party, where she meets Garrett, a single father. With help from Garrett and his daughter, her business soon begins to take flight.

programme.title: A Safari Romance
programme.desc: Working on protecting the wildlife in Africa, a biologist teams up with a theme park designer who wants to create an over-the-top safari attraction.

programme.title: Love in the Clouds
programme.desc: Reporter Brooklyn travels to the Balloon Fiesta to meet hot air balloon pilot Jared, who offers romantic balloon rides but is closed off to love himself.
